title: 1000th Win with a Riot Employee?
body:
So I heard that someone from Riot would play with you if you were at 999 wins and opened a ticket with them. I am currently sitting at 999 normal wins and wanted my 1000th win to be something special from the company. I ended up opening a ticket and player support redirected me here. Should there be a better method to get in contact with Riot employees to play those big milestone games? Would people be interested in playing with a Rioter for their big milestones?

p.s. this is a shameless attempt to get a Rioter to notice me and go for that 1k win milestone

replies.body: Whew, we used to do this often back when League was still a small community.  It's hard to do these now that the scale is so large, but I'm up for a game.  I may be able to grab some fellow support members too.  I'm free for the next hour, if you're available for a game!  And grats on your progress.  :D
That sounds amazing! I've been playing on and off since pre-season 2 but I've never gotten this chance before!
Woo!  There are plenty of Rioters in many game modes, we just don't always have Riot in our name but we're around.  :)  I'll hit you up in client!
